title: Cable and Internet Ready, On-call Maintenance
posting_body: Use this link for more information:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 675 Sq.
Discover the stunning hills of Kirkland, Washington living at Sancerre Apartments.
Our community melds the old-world charm of the French countryside with contemporary comforts and convenience.
A variety of dining, retail, and entertainment options are minutes away.
Close to Interstate 405 makes commuting a breeze, and you’re only a short drive from the excitement of Seattle.
Experience a new standard of living at Sancerre Apartments.
*We do not accept Reusable Tenant Screening Reports
Weight limit of 50 pounds or less.
Non-refundable pet fee is $300 per pet.
Monthly pet rent will be charged per pet.
Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.
If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.
Please contact our leasing team with any questions.
